resources.string:
Next feature release
 New Features:
 · Browse pocket queries online (long press on nearby)
 · Popup on map shows date of event caches
 · Show cache where a Geokrety is currently placed
 · Configurable twitter templates
 · Creating a new WP the type will be preset depending on the cache type
 · Show event date for OC event caches in search results
 · Sorting caches by favorite point percentage
 
 Bugfixes:
 · Cache type filter was not applied for OC nearby search
 · No cache coords if cache is at equator or prime meridian
 · Parts of the compass not shown when using big fonts
 · WP with special characters have not been shown
 · Disallow deletion of all caches incl. list if a filter is in use
 · OC authorization page not shown in light theme
 · DirChooser not showing all dirs on some devices
 · Allow manual path input in dirchooser
 · Network timeout reduced to 30 seconds to avoid long waiting time
 · Show as list also possible when map is not live
